__prompts__.application: Type the name of the package
__prompts__.project_slug: Type the component name for the project must be alphanumeric with an underscore as a separator, max size 50, following this pattern: ^['a-zA-Z0-9']+(?:[_]['a-zA-Z0-9']+)?$ .
__prompts__.component_description: Type a description for the project
__prompts__.version: Type the version of the project
__prompts__.use_git: Which git do you want to use?
